review: I've had this item for some time now, and am very pleased with it.I honestly had the chrome cast, and a Roku already. I bought this item to play fibbage, but once I began to use it, I found the Fire TV Stick to be easier to navigate for myself, and my family.A great buy. I travel for work, and setting this up on a hotel display takes two minutes to setup.
author: David Horowitz "Steve Holt!!!"
